Text: Defeat the opposing team in 2 out of 3 Rounds of combat!
The Elder Drake deals high damage by using abilities that <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISE ATK</font>. It will also <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> your Champions.

The Scion of Fire <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUNS</font> your Champions and deals massive damage by using abilities that <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISE ATK</font> and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISE CRIT</font>.
The Scion of Water has very high HP and abilities that <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> your Champions. It will try to outlast you.
The Scion of Nature can heal itself with the <font color='{buff_blue}'>REGENERATION</font> buff.
The Scion of Light has very high <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>. Dealing direct damage to it is difficult.
The Scion of Darkness and its acolytes inflict brutal <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font> to your Champions.
The Guardian of Spirit deals damage based on its <font color='{spd_skyblue}'>ATK SPD</font> and has very low cooldowns.
The Steel Widow deals massive damage but has little defensive ability. Try to destroy it as quickly as possible!
The Dark Bull Demon King attacks faster and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES CRIT</font> as he takes damage. His crystals inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font>.

The Fire Bull Demon King attacks faster and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES ATK</font> as he takes damage. His crystals' attacks <font color='{menu_highlight_white}'>ignore </font><font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.
The Light Bull Demon King attacks faster and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES ATK</font> as he takes damage. His left crystal <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES DEF</font>.
The Golden Bull Demon King attacks faster as he takes damage. The left crystal inflicts <font color='{debuff_red}'>MORTAL WOUNDS</font>.
The Nature Bull Demon King attacks faster as he takes damage. His crystals apply the <font color='{buff_blue}'>INVULNERABILITY</font> buff and <font color='{menu_highlight_white}'>HEAL</font> him.
The Water Bull Demon King attacks faster as he takes damage. His crystals <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> and inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>MORTAL WOUNDS</font>.
Fight the Dark Ranger and earn her shards to summon her.
Fight the Fire Basilisk and earn its shards to summon it.
Fight the Water Psion and earn his shards to summon him.
Fight the Nature Valkyrie and earn her shards to summon her.
Xylia
Wink
Rogrim
Viro & Kraakk
Granya
Gabion
Malice
Starg'oth
Calepheneus
Xylia <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.lower_atk} LOWERS ATK</font> and prevents enemies from healing by inflicting <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.mortal} MORTAL WOUNDS</font>.
Wink is a powerful and swift Assassin that can <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.disorient} DISORIENT</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.silence} SILENCE</font> her enemies.
Rogrim is a very balanced Fighter who can deal massive damage while healing himself with his Basic Skill.
Stay away from Viro & Kraakk! Their bite attack ignores a large portion of their enemy's <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.

Granya <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.lower_atk_spd} LOWERS ATK SPD</font> of her enemies, in addition to inflicting <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.fear} FEAR</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.stun} STUN</font>.

Gabion can <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.shield} SHIELD</font> his allies and <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.blockbuff} BLOCK BUFFS</font> that his enemies attempt to apply. He can also transfer debuffs afflicting him to his enemies.
Malice is a very strong Tank who can heal himself and inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.ongoing} ONGOING DAMAGE</font>.

Starg'oth can <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.stun} STUN</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.disorient} DISORIENT</font> his enemies. His ultimate skill will always land a critical hit, causing grievous damage.

Calepheneus can <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.blind} BLIND</font> his enemies and <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.reflect}REFLECT DAMAGE</font> back at his attackers. He can temporarily gain <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.invulnerability} INVULNERABILITY</font> to damage and <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.immunity} IMMUNITY</font> to debuffs.
Tap and hold a Champion or enemy portrait to see details.
<font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Elemental (Blaze)</font> can <font color='{debuff_red}'>SLOW</font> the movement speed of Champions.
You can't kill the Spirit Guardian. Run for your life and destroy the <font color='{debuff_red}'>RED CRYSTALS</font>.
The giant Scorpion's skills can affect Champions too. Watch out when he attacks barricades!
You can add a third Champion to your party.
Don't stand in the swarm of crows cast by the Crow Hag.
Don't stand in the swarm of crows cast by the Crow Hag.
Move your Champion away from the Elder Drake's <font color='{atk_orange}'>FIRE BREATH</font>. It deals a lot of damage.
The Golem's Earthquake skill is dangerous, but can be interrupted with <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> or knockback skills.
The Golem's Earthquake skill is dangerous, but can be interrupted with <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> or knockback skills.
The Basilisk will <font color='{buff_blue}'>SHIELD</font> his allies and inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font>.
<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>AUTO-MODE</font> lets your Champions act on their own. You can still move them out of danger manually.
Don't attack the tower by yourself! Wait for your <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>TROOPS</font> and let them draw fire.
Kill the enemies before they destroy the blue <font color='#70b9f7'>TIME CRYSTAL</font>.
<font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Golem (Jasper)</font> can <font color='{debuff_red}'>PROVOKE</font> Champions, forcing them to attack him.
The Shark's Final Bite gives him <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.regen} REGENERATION</font> if it kills the Champion.
<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SUPPORT</font> Champions are extremely useful in ensuring the survival of your party.
<font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Imp (Vark)</font> can <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER DEF</font>, causing your Champions to take more damage.
The Dryad can create magical <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>HEALING</font> zones around her allies.
<font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Time Keeper (Vimal)</font> can <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> Champions in a wide area. Don't stand too close together!
In the Arena, you must defeat the enemy team in 2 out of 3 Rounds of combat.
<font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Dragon Guard (Monument)</font> can use Demoralizing Blow to <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER ATK</font>. Watch out!
<font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} Valkyrie (Kalda)</font> uses her Tempest skill to <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.raise_atk_spd} RAISE ATK SPD</font> of her allies.
Try to equip multiple pieces of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR</font> from the same <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR SET</font> to get the most from their set bonuses.
<font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} NATURE</font> Champions deal more damage and take less damage versus <font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} WATER</font> opponents.
When you have low HP, grab a health pickup or run back to your base to heal up!
You can add a fourth Champion to your party.
<font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} Basilisk (Jabari)</font> can <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> Champions in a wide cone. Get him to face away from your party!
The Bull Demon King smashes his foes with his axes. Move out of the way!
<font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} Fairy (Vim)</font> can teleport quickly around the battlefield, making her tricky to catch.
<font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} Ink Ninja (Suzuri)</font> draws ink circles on the ground. They explode after a short delay, so don't stand still!
Killing the enemy <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SUPPORT</font> first will decrease the survivability of their allies, making it easier to pick them off.
<font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} Dozer (Clamp)</font> can <font color='{debuff_red}'>BLIND</font> your Champions with its laser, causing them to miss their attacks.
When multiple Champions attack you, <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>RETREAT</font> to your Tower. Its powerful attacks will quickly even the odds!
When <font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} Skand Berserker (Brute)</font> takes lethal damage, he gains <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.endure} UNDYING</font> for a few seconds.
All <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR</font> can grant <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SET BONUSES</font> when worn with pieces of the same set.
Reading the descriptions of your Skills can help you decide which <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR</font> to equip.
<font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} Imp (Zekk)</font> can hurl a bouncing fireball that <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWERS DEF</font>.
<font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} Mercenary (Rhona)</font> can finish off wounded Champions. Don't let your health drop too low!
Reach and destroy the enemy Core.
The Ranger can deal a lot of damage quickly, but she doesn't have very high <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.
<font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} Esper (Keeva)</font> <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWERS ATK</font> with her basic skill.
All melee Champions attack an area in front of them, which is useful against hordes of melee opponents.
The Sentinel's basic skill inflicts <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font> on Champions.
Dino Kid can inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.mortal} MORTAL WOUNDS</font>, which prevents your Champions from being healed.
If you are running low on Gold to upgrade your Gear, try selling unwanted Gear!
Don't stay still for too long. If a Laser Web hits your Champions, they will be <font color='{debuff_red}'>IMMOBILIZED</font>.
Destroying roadblocks faster will create more distance between you and the Spirit Guardian.
If you discover hidden Chests, you can destroy them for extra loot.
<font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Golem (Jasper)</font> will <font color='{debuff_red}'>DISORIENT</font> your Champions if they stand in his Earthquake.
Upgrading <font color='{menu_highlight_white}'>GEAR</font> increases stats each level and unlocks new stats every few levels.
The Derby Girl will slam your Champions with her baseball bat, interrupting skills and knocking them away.
<font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} Skand Warlord (Malice)</font> inflicts <font color='{debuff_red}'>FEAR</font> on Champions, making them uncontrollable for a short time.
The Dino Kid can deal damage from far away, but even more in melee range!
The Crystal Priest is a very weak attacker, but can <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>HEAL</font> his allies very effectively.
Equip 2 pieces of Gear from the {icon.gearset1}Vital Set to increase your Champion's <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font>.
At least 1 blue <font color='#70b9f7'>Time Crystal</font> needs to survive in order to achieve victory.
While the Elder Drake is flying he can't be attacked. Focus on clearing the area.
<font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} Siege Tower (Caroline)</font> heals herself with each attack as long as her <font color='{buff_blue}'>SHIELD</font> remains intact.
Champions such as the Valkyrie can give their allies <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.haste} HASTE</font> to increase movement speed.
If you see a Gold Grublin, try to kill it quickly! They drop a lot of Gold.
Be sure to check the Guide in the Missions menu to learn more about the game!

<font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} Tiki Warrior (Haunani)</font> <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.immobilize} IMMOBILIZES</font> Champions, making them unable to move, but they can still attack and use skills.
<font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} Naga (Fathom)</font> will transfer <font color='{debuff_red}'>DEBUFFS</font> from himself to his target.
It takes time for enemy Champions to respawn. Destroy their towers while you have the chance.

Try to not use <font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} FIRE</font> Champions when facing a <font color='{element_water}'>{icon.element_water} WATER</font> team. They will receive more damage.
<font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Ranger (Deidra)</font> tumbles away if threatened and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES ATK</font> of her allies in the process.
Adventure is the best place to earn {icon.champXP}XP for your Champions.
The Elder Drake will try to bite Champions near it, dealing heavy damage. Move out of the way before it strikes!

The <font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} Crow Hag (Walpurga)</font> can <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER DEF</font> of Champions while dealing <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font>.
The Dino Kid's pet dinosaur can knock Champions away with a mighty headbutt.
<font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} Snake Lady (Lingshe)</font> throws an orb of venom that <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWERS ATK SPD</font>. Try to avoid the blast!
The Steel Widow does very high burst damage. Try to kill it quickly before it overwhelms you.
When fleeing the Spirit Guardian, don't focus on killing enemies. It is more important to destroy <font color='{debuff_red}'>RED CRYSTALS</font>.
The Greater Demon summons gifts from the Outer to heal him. Destroy them quickly.
Equip 4 pieces of Gear from the {icon.gearset2}Brutal Set to increase your Champion's <font color='{atk_orange}'>ATK</font>.
The Fairy's magic orbs will always return to her. Watch out!
A Devil's basic skill heals him for a portion of the damage dealt.
The Scorpion is a slow-moving target, making it easy to land skills from a distance.
Your enemies can't defend their base if they're dead! Be sure to press the advantage after scoring a kill.
When facing opponents of the <font color='{element_nature}'>{icon.element_nature} NATURE</font> element, it is best to bring <font color='{element_fire}'>{icon.element_fire} FIRE</font> Champions.
These enemies can inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font>, which ignores <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.
These monsters will <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font>, inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>FEAR</font>, and <font color='{debuff_red}'>SLOW</font> your Champions.
These enemies will <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER DEF</font>.
This gang of Assassins will deal high damage quickly.
These enemies can inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font>, which ignores <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.
These Champions can <font color='{debuff_red}'>MARK</font> their target to deal more damage to them.
The Grublin Shaman can give his allies <font color='{buff_blue}'>IMMUNITY</font> to debuffs.
These enemies will <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER ATK SPD</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>DISORIENT</font> your Champions.
The Light Golem can <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> your Champions and <font color='{menu_highlight_white}'>STEAL</font> their buffs.
The Crow Hag can <font color='{debuff_red}'>DISORIENT</font> your Champions, preventing them from applying critical hits or debuffs.
The Dino Kid will <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>MARK</font> his target.
These enemies have high <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font> and will heal themselves.
The Derby Girl is a formidable duelist.
The Ranger can deal high damage very quickly.
These enemies will deal high damage and score critical hits frequently.
These enemies will increase their Attack and reduce yours.
The Squire <font color='{debuff_red}'>PROVOKES</font> other Champions, forcing them to use Basic Skills against him.
These enemies will heal themselves, <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER ATK</font>, and <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER ATK SPD</font>.
These Champions have high <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font> and will heal themselves.
These enemies will <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> your Champions and heal themselves.
The Harpy can <font color='{debuff_red}'>SILENCE</font> enemies and inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>MORTAL WOUNDS</font>, which blocks healing.
These enemies will protect themselves with <font color='{buff_blue}'>SHIELDS</font>.
The Valkyrie lowers the cooldowns of her allies and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES ATK SPD</font>.
The Dryad <font color='{debuff_red}'>MARKS</font> your Champions, making them take increased damage.
These Champions will reduce their skill cooldowns.

These enemies will <font color='{debuff_red}'>SILENCE</font>, <font color='{debuff_red}'>BLIND</font>, and <font color='{debuff_red}'>DISORIENT</font> your Champions, making their attacks ineffective.
The Boon Sister <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWERS ATK</font> of her enemies and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES ATK</font> of her allies.
The Sentinel has high <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font> and can deal very high damage to a single Champion.
The Basilisk's skills can <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISE DEF</font> of his allies, <font color='{buff_blue}'>SHIELD</font> them, or give them <font color='{buff_blue}'>IMMUNITY</font> to debuffs.
The Dark Esper's shield also gives her the <font color='{buff_blue}'>DAMAGE REFLECTION</font> buff, dealing back a portion of the damage dealt to her.
The Dragon Guard deals damage according to its <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.
These enemies rely on <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font> for both protection and dealing damage.
Champions with high <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font> will take more damage from <font color='{debuff_red}'>ONGOING DAMAGE</font>.
The Mercenary <font color='{debuff_red}'>PROVOKES</font> her opponents, forcing them to attack her.
The Time Keeper and Valkyrie can reduce the cooldown time of skills.
The Astromancer is powerful but very fragile. Her Golem will <font color='{debuff_red}'>PROVOKE</font> or <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> your Champions.
The Dino Kid is strong in both melee and ranged combat.
The Dark Dragon Guard's skills <font color='{debuff_red}'>LOWER ATK SPD</font>.
The Crystal Priest can heal and give his allies <font color='{buff_blue}'>IMMUNITY</font> to debuffs.
The Dino Kid can <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> and inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>FEAR</font> on your Champions.
The Dark Mercenary ultimate skill ignores a portion of the enemy <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.
The Archangels and their acolytes have very high <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font> and <font color='{spd_skyblue}'>ATK SPD</font>.
The Valkyrie applies the <font color='{buff_blue}'>HASTE</font> buff to her allies and <font color='{buff_blue}'>RAISES ATK SPD</font>.
The Blademaster's skill damage scales with her <font color='{spd_skyblue}'>ATK SPD</font>.
The Time Keeper's attacks can lower his allies' cooldowns.

These enemies will <font color='{buff_blue}'>SHIELD</font> themselves and hinder your attacks with skills that <font color='{debuff_red}'>SILENCE</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>BLIND</font> your Champions.
The Naga will <font color='{menu_highlight_white}'>TRANSFER DEBUFFS</font> from himself to his target.
The Skand Warlord's ultimate skill deals damage and heals him a lot!
These enemies will <font color='{debuff_red}'>STUN</font> and debuff your Champions.
The Greater Demon will consume his enemies' buffs to heal himself.
